ca.diro.UserHandlingUtils

Enum UserPermission

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<UserPermission>
      • ca.diro.UserHandlingUtils.UserPermission
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparable<UserPermission>

    public enum UserPermission
extends Enum<UserPermission>
    Description of the required permission to perform a certain action. Do not confuse those with the "roles" given to users. "Roles" only define the different kind of users, these UserPermission define different states the users can be in using an enum along with a quick way of comparing two values.
    Author:
    lavoiedn

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      ADMIN
      Absolute permission.
      COMMENT_OWNER
      The user must be the owner of a comment to alter it.
      EVENT_OWNER
      The user must be the owner of an event to alter it.
      LOGGED_USER
      The user must be logged in to perform this action.
      NONE
      Any user can perform this action.
      PREMIUM
      We like money so charging users for more permissions is good.
      REGISTERED_USER
      The user must have an existing account to perform this action.
      UNAUTHORIZED
      No one can use this.
